properties.entry: SELECT SHOPPING_NO, SHOPPING_TITLE, EMPLOYEE_NM, READ_COUNT, CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.SHOPPING_NO = B.SHOPPING_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM SHOPPING B JOIN EMPLOYEE USING(EMPLOYEE_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' ORDER BY SHOPPING_NO DESC
